entry.title: I wish I could leave you my love (But my heart is a mess)
entry.summary:
Author: Winelady

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,196Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 175

Summary: The Sheriff exhales. "I need you to go. The pack, too. Stiles has a chance at a normal life now, and I need you to give him that."Derek feels like the floor has disappeared beneath him. "No," he says instinctively, shaking his head. "No, I can help—""Derek." The Sheriff’s voice is firm, but there’s an unmistakable sadness in it. "For the first time in years, Stiles is safe. He doesn’t remember any of it—the supernatural, the threats, the things that nearly killed him. He has a chance at something normal. We can’t take that away from him."Sheriff doesn’t know the weight of what Derek is being asked to do.But Derek does.****This is the story of how Derek Hale lost the love of his life—and how Stiles Stilinski, being the stubborn little shit he is, wormed his way into his life again.

entry.title: The Darker Side of the Moon
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,130Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 119

Summary: The pack was his home. His family.Until, suddenly, it wasn’t.No explanations, no goodbyes—just the crushing silence of those Stiles had spent years risking his life for. He doesn’t understand. He tries to move on. He fails.And then, he disappears.Kidnapped. Isolated. Reduced to nothing in the hands of monsters who don’t need claws or fangs to tear him apart. Every day is a battle between pain and despair, every second a fight to hold on, to not break. But even the strongest souls have a limit.When that limit shatters, something inside him awakens. Something that was never meant to exist.Something that might save him.Or destroy him completely.

entry.title: The Alpha's List
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,756Chapters: 19/26Kudos: 235

Summary: In the Game of Love, he Made the Rules. The Honorable Derek Hale, Marquis of Redbridge.He is aristocratic, excessively handsome, excessively wealthy, aloof, reserved, arrogant and the powerful Alpha of one of the most renowned packs in the country. He has been an elusive prize for years, the target of desperate society Omega and their matchmaking mothers. But he is not swayed by flirtatious smiles and fine looks, social climbers and fortune hunters. He wants more.When his lack of an Omega causes concern to his mother, uncle and pack a remedy is suggested in the form of a suitable match. Derek draws up a list of qualifications and attributes for his future mate. Can any Omega hope to win the heart of such a demanding bachelor and cynic?Stiles Stilinski the Omega son of a clergyman can only try his best. The Marquis is not sure whether he has discovered the perfect Omega… Or the been the victim of a cruel hoax.

entry.title: Contradictory Impossibilities
entry.summary:
Author: sifshadowheart

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 64,020Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 1,216

Summary: Harry and his Circle were having a nice relaxing evening at home when out of nowhere, two of their kids (they were adults, well versed and set in their dynamics, but they'd always be Harry's kids) were snatched away in a Soul Scream.It's from a tiny little speck on the Earth map called Beacon Hills, California.The Submissive in distress? None other than one Stiles Stilinski, resident trouble-magnet and pain-in-the-ass, who'd had his inheritance suppressed until enough trauma and sheer need and pain had shattered the seals he was under.And unleashed something inside of him that was never meant to see the light of day.Or the love of a Circle of his very own.

Summary: He hadn’t slept since his escape. He couldn’t sleep on the bus, his mind far too busy trying to make sense of the nonsensical. entry.title: Morning Dew
entry.summary:
Author: Samandiriel (kyra516)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,291Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 117

Summary: Stiles had always been a bit of an odd bunny compared to his peers. He had this sense of adventure and the need to explore! His father said he got most of it from his late mother. His father also called it recklessness and lack of self-preservation. Most of the time, Stiles just dismissed his father as being plain wrong.Today however? Today he reckoned his father was completely and truly right in his judgement. Because today, Stiles had made the most reckless and stupid decision of his life. You see, Stiles had the brilliant idea of venturing into wolf lands to do some gathering, and so here he was, on the other side of the river, in the unknown lands that no bunny before him had dared to venture into. What could possibly go wrong?It was all Jackson's fault anyway.  ---The story is finished and will be fully published either by me, or in case of my death, by my friend. You will not be left hanging. ---

entry.title: Ghost in the Machine
entry.summary:
Author: pixieblade

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,345Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 160

Summary: There was a boy sitting on the bleachers.To be honest, Derek wouldn’t have given him the time of day normally, but there were a few things that struck him as odd. Firstly, there was still a good thirty minutes before school let out. Secondly, the boy was silently staring out towards the preserve with a pensive expression. Thirdly, he had no scent, and his heartbeat was non-existent.Okay, maybe he should have led with that, but the point was, there was a boy sitting on the bleachers, and Derek seemed to be the only one who could see him.

entry.title: Found You Again
entry.summary:
Author: PheonixInk

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 737Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 28

Summary: Years after their last goodbye, Stiles never expected to see Derek Hale again. But fate or maybe something more has other plans. When Stiles stumbles into Derek’s path after a supernatural case brings them back to the same place, old wounds resurface, old flames reignite, and the love they thought they lost refuses to stay buried.

entry.title: Guided by a Beating Heart
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 62,375Chapters: 46/54Kudos: 59

Summary: (Further continuation of Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU)After defeating their second Goa'uld System Lord in less than a year, the residents of Beacon Hills must adapt to their ever-changing world.Cora Hale has broken the family curse, but now she must continue her work of rehabilitating the Hale-Littlefield Pack while keeping Beacon Hills safe for all its residents.Stiles Stilinski continues his journey of recovery and self-discovery after his possession.Derek Hale faces new challenges as he starts going on offworld missions through the Stargate.
